Full Screen Action sample

Description :
This is a very simple plug-in for DAZ Studio that shows the basics of setting up a DAZ Studio plug-in, and inheriting from a DAZ Studio SDK class to add new functionality to DAZ Studio. In this plug-in we create a new menu/toolbar item by subclassing DzAction. The action activates full screen mode for the active viewport when the user clicks on the item.
 
Concepts Covered :
  • Making a simple DAZ Studio plug-in
  • Addition of an action item by inheriting DzAction
  • Setting the default action group for an action
  • Setting the default accelerator (keyboard shortcut) for an action
  • Setting the default menu path for an action
  • Suggested coding standards and project layout
 
Files : ./sdk/samples/interface/DzFullScreenAction
dzfullscreenaction.h The action class header.
dzfullscreenaction.cpp The action class implementation.
dzfullscreenaction.def The exports definition file for compiling under Windows.
pluginmain.cpp The plug-in definition.
DzFullScreenAction.vcproj Microsoft Visual C++ 2010 project file.
